title: net4.0安装失败
author: 枯港
txt_content:
net4.0安装失败
OS Version = 6.1.7601, Platform 2, Service Pack 1
OS Description = Windows 7 - x64 Ultimate Edition Service Pack 1

CommandLine = G:\8fb67bd3cb7cd0dc41d2d28cf4f057b2\\Setup.exe /x86 /x64


Using Simultaneous Download and Install mechanism


Operation: Installing

Package Name = Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Setup
Package Version = 4.0.30319

User Experience Data Collection Policy: Disabled




Number of applicable items: 9






Final Result: Installation failed with error code: (0x80070643), "安装时发生严重错误 " (Elapsed time: 0 00:01:07).

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
枯港 发表于 2020-4-22 21:10
\SysWOW64\这个文件没有de
那你就把第一个改了再装试试记得备份原文件

replies.author: qq625886425
replies.txt_content: 用360安全卫士的软件安装nt4.0
